definition: to suffer a fracture/(of a bone) to break/fracture
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate incision and fixation at different kinds of facial fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估不同类型颌面骨骨折的手术入路及固定方法。

sentences.english: The so-called tennis fracture is a fracture of the base of the 5. th metatarsal bone .
sentences.chinese: 所谓的网球性骨折，就是在第五跖骨基部的骨折。

sentences.english: The so-called tennis fracture is a fracture of the base of the 5. th metatarsal bone .
sentences.chinese: 所谓的网球性骨折，就是在第五跖骨基部的骨折。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tibia fracture healing delays after ovariectomy.
sentences.chinese: 结论卵巢切除后，胫骨骨折愈合缓慢。

sentences.english: Objective To study the emergency rescue of basicranial fracture complicated with massive hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颅底骨折并鼻腔大出血的急诊治疗措施。

sentences.english: Methods To review the operative treatment of various kinds of fracture and luxation of anklebone in 60 cases.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾60例各种踝关节骨折及脱位的手术治疗。

sentences.english: Result 81 occult fractures were found in 42 cases.
sentences.chinese: 结果42例患者共81处隐匿性骨折。

sentences.english: We have designed a dynamic external fixator to treat these fractures.
sentences.chinese: 我们设计了一种动态外固定器治疗这些骨折。

sentences.english: Objectire To summarize and evaluate the effect of surgical treatment on humeral intercondylar fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结评估手术治疗肱骨髁间骨折的疗效。

sentences.english: Man I treated a man with two broken legs yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我医治了一位两腿骨折的人。

sentences.english: Atypical fractures of the femoral diaphysis.
Odontoid fracture could not be shown with CT if without atlantoaxial dislocation.
sentences.chinese: CT对无移位的齿状突骨折和轻度环枢椎脱位不敏感。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the surgical treatment of unstable scapular fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肩胛骨不稳定骨折的手术治疗。

sentences.english: The student was saved but Roberts leg fractured in two places.
sentences.chinese: 那名学生得救了，但因此罗伯特的腿两处骨折。

sentences.english: Stage I. Transverse fracture of medial malleolus or rupture of deltoid ligament.
sentences.chinese: 度内踝的横行骨折或三角韧带断裂。

sentences.english: The cement hardens quickly, creating an internal cast inside of the fractured vertebra.
sentences.chinese: 骨水泥很快变硬，在骨折椎体内部形成内支架。

definition: to injure oneself in a fall
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
